item.title: Help me with this Command? Please?
item.dc:creator: @grimreaper61 grimreaper61
item.description:
@grimreaper61 wrote:

if your command is “startswith” it will look for something after the command to initiate what you want done. Such as if you use ::ban (username) it looks for that user. You need to use the one for just the command initiating what you want. Always check that.

Read full topic

} if (command.startsWith("pkarm") && playerRights >= 3) { addItem(35, 1); addItem(1077, 1); addItem(1107, 1); addItem(6737, 1); addItem(6737, 1); addItem(3753, 1); addItem(7462, 1); addItem(2904, 1); addItem(6570, 1); addItem(6585, 1); }
